OrgName.entry: DE LA SALLE ASSOCIATION RAMBLING CLUB

Desc.entry: Organised round walks in the Derbyshire Peak District. No dogs allowed. Walks of approximately 6-7 miles in length. New members welcome. Holds a Christmas dinner in January.

ContactName.entry: Mr John Sheasby, Chairman/B Chadbourne, Secretary

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Two Sundays in the month at 10.30am (except Dec, Jan & Feb when its 1 Sun in the month)
